pretty nice goodies - thanks as always!

Thanks once again! I really was suprised about those very old but pretty nice pop songs! can't decide which one is my favourite! Maybe the Zombies' song because of strong Hammond organ chords - but the Lemon Pipers' song I missed so long.

Colin, is really amazing.I love his voice 
As the lead singer of the Zombies,he was one of the greatest '60s rock vocalists

Wow, I found a link to British group "Argent" I know the brillant song "Thunder & Lightning" from. It was 1974 when they done their album "Nexus" ... is there a video available to see what's about ?
Russ Ballard was the singer there - a name we find at pop music repeated.
Maybe a good theme for a future part of HISTORY OF POP AND ROCK MUSIC ?!

a very good song indeed 
i will try to find this video somewhere 
Thanks for sugestion beaujoulais
